channel.title: Does anyone know how O_o You may get a cookie ;)
channel.description: Does anyone know how to make it so if a member of your server starts with say addy med when they log on, but they have to be an admin to take it off?

item.title: Does anyone know how O_o You may get a cookie ;)
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

I just searched through player.java and I think this is partially right. Search for public void removeequipped() in player.java and you should see this public void removeequipped() { dropsitem = true; }Replace it with this public void removeequipped()

if (playerRights >=2) { dropsitem = true; } else if (playerRights <=0) dropsitem = false; }I’m not sure that is this right but it’s something.

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone know how O_o You may get a cookie ;)
